caption.title: Geographical location of the mosquito sampling sites and distribution of Aedes spp on Wallis and Futuna.
caption.p: The numbers represent the 54 sampling points on (A) the island of Wallis, (B) the islands of Futuna and Alofi. The presence of the different Aedes species is represented by a sign near the locality name according to the legend on the map. Open source maps from USGS LandsatLook ( https://landsatlook.usgs.gov/viewer.html) annotated with Adobe Photoshop 8.0.1.
